channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Nvidia hits $3 trillion, making CEO Jensen Huang richer than Michael Dell
item.description: Huang, 61, is leading a new wave of tech billionaires

item.title: Nadella, Narayen among tech CEOs investing in cricket's American dream
item.description: As the Men's T20 Cricket World Cup, co-hosted by the U.S. for the first time, ramps up, investors seek to bring the sport into the American mainstream.

item.title: CrowdStrike, KKR and GoDaddy to join S&P 500
Nicotine patches, like Zyn, are used by 400,000 teens. Here's why some experts say 'it's reasonable to be concerned'
item.description: Health risks of nicotine include a moderately elevated risk of increased blood pressure, heart rate, and a narrowing of the arteries.

item.title: Jim Cramer names packaged food stocks likely to do well in a slower economy
item.description: CNBC's Jim Cramer pinpointed Campbell Soup and J.M. Smucker, along with Tyson Foods, Hormel, General Mills, Conagra and Kellanova.

item.title: A look inside a $1 billion real-estate bet on the future of San Francisco
Tides turn for seafood—more fish were farm-raised than caught in the wild for the first time ever
item.description: Some 90% of aquatic animals that are farmed or fished go to human consumption, per the UN.

item.title: Jim Cramer's week ahead: Fed meeting and CPI report
item.description: CNBC's Jim Cramer on Friday guided investors through next week's most market-moving events: Apple's WWDC24, the Fed meeting, Adobe's earnings and more.

item.title: Biden or Trump? Watch these economic indicators for clues on the election.
Kia recalls 463,000 Telluride SUVs that could catch fire and cautions drivers to park outdoors
item.description: People may notice a burning or melting smell, or see smoke rising from underneath the seat.

item.title: FDA approves GSK's RSV vaccine for high-risk adults ages 50 to 59, expanding shot's reach
item.description: The FDA's expanded approval could help GSK maintain its dominance in the RSV market, which includes shots from Pfizer and Moderna.

item.title: GameStop’s stock suffers worst day since 2021 despite Roaring Kitty livestream
Cold Stone Creamery is facing a legal battle after a New York woman discovered that her 'pistachio' ice cream contained no real pistachios
item.description: Rather than the nuts, the dessert contained a mix of water, ethanol, and food coloring.

item.title: The Fed's rate decision and May inflation data will be key tests for the stock market next week
item.description: The next rate decision from the Federal Reserve and an update on inflation in May will play a key role in how stocks perform next week.

item.title: U.S. stocks end lower after hotter-than-expected May jobs report
